feed.title: The fastest and smoothest way to good architecture

entry.title: Our new site
entry.content: Welcome to our new website design, specifically recreated to ensure that you, our amazing community, has a place to find all the documentation, videos, and discussion you could ever want for the projects in the Highway Framework. We will be adding a lot of content to the site over the next few days. Please bear with us if there is any dust settling from the move.
